ygData.subject: Re: Burned out Lighstones, Quest? was Re: Elf Hide Gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, though perhaps one of the practice runes needs a burnt out lightstone, I m pretty sure the real reason they exist is to make wisps glow before
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn Swiftsong wrote:
>
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> No big secret as to what burned out lightstones are for. There is a practice
> research item that allows finger wigglers to build up their research without
> wasting rare research componets.

Actually, though perhaps one of the practice runes needs a burnt out
lightstone, I'm pretty sure the real reason they exist is to make wisps
glow before they die. You used to be able to tell if a wisp had a
lightstone because it would glow in the dark, while ones without stones
would not.

After the burnt out lightstones appeared, all wisps glow in the dark.

Jyzan
